title: Lava Beds National Monument: Current Conditions
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Current Conditions             Alerts & Conditions         Alerts    Information        White-Nose Syndrome  Alert 1 , Severity ,information ,, White-Nose Syndrome  White-nose syndrome has spread to Washington state. If you have gear that has been into any caves or mines outside of Lava Beds, please leave those items at home. When you arrive to Lava Beds, stop by the visitor center for screening and decontamination. more
